## dhtSync() function

A utility function to wait until all conductors' integrated DhtOps are identical for a DNA.

**Signature:**

```typescript
dhtSync: (players: Player[], dnaHash: DnaHash, timeoutMs?: number) => Promise<never>
```

</th><th>

</td><td>

</td><td>

Array of players.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

dnaHash


</td><td>

DnaHash


</td><td>

DNA hash to compare integrated DhtOps from.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

timeoutMs


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ A timeout for the delay (defaults to 60000 milliseconds).


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;never&gt;

A promise that is resolved after all agents' DHT states match.
